name: llm-chat-kit
description: A lightweight, reusable LLM chat interface for research projects

scripts.dev: bun run build:client && bun run --watch src/server/index.ts
scripts.build: bun run build:client && bun run build:server
scripts.build:client: bun build src/client/index.ts --outdir dist/client --minify && cp src/client/index.html dist/client/ && cp -r src/client/styles dist/client/
